issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
h3. Request 

Expose the native webview methods shouldInterceptRequest and shouldOverrideUrlLoading in order to be able to to filter non desired content through the webview.

h3. Current Behavior

Both functionalities are not available for customer to be implemented.
fields.summary: Android: Expose shouldInterceptRequest and shouldOverrideUrlLoading in the native webview component
fields.environment:
Product: Titanium SDK
Titanium SDK: Mobile 3.1GA
Platform OS: Android
Platform OS Version: 4

comments.body:
Any chance this gets implemented? If I understand correct shouldOverrideUrlLoading is also required if you want to catch link click events coming from the webView. We also need this.

Cheers!
